properties.areaDesc: Andrews; Southern Lea County; Martin; Howard
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 2:34PM CST until February 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Light ice accumulations of
a few hundredths of an inch are possible. Trace amounts of snow
are possible.

* WHERE...In New Mexico, Southern Lea County. In Texas, Andrews,
Martin and Howard Counties.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening or morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by
calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY
